DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prostate Cancer Treatment Questionnaire Prostate Cancer Spreads To Other Parts Of The Body

The vast majority are carcinomas._The entire physical structure of an organism. It is composed of anatomic systems, regions, cavities, and spaces._A primary or metastatic malignant tumor involving the prostate gland.
